dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in April, Kazhydromet issued warnings for Astana and eight regions about some serious weather.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in April, Kazhydromet issued warnings for Astana and eight regions about some serious weather.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 21, residents of Astana and eight regions of Kazakhstan were warned of thunderstorms and strong winds; hail is expected in some areas, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like thunderstorms and strong winds, right? I remember that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like thunderstorms and strong winds, right? I remember that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 21, residents of Astana and eight regions of Kazakhstan were warned of thunderstorms and strong winds; hail is expected in some areas, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And not just wind, they were talking gusts up to 15-20 meters per second in the capital.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And not just wind, they were talking gusts up to fifteen to twenty meters per second in the capital.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Astana, a thunderstorm is expected during the day. The wind will shift from southwest to northeast, with occasional gusts reaching 15"20 meters per second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty intense. And then, uh, hail in some areas too, especially up north in the Abai Region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty intense. And then, uh, hail in some areas too, especially up north in the Abai Region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the Abai Region, thunderstorms and hail are expected in the northern and central parts during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the Atyrau Region was expecting easterly winds with similar gusts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And the Atyrau Region was expecting easterly winds with similar gusts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the Atyrau Region, the wind is expected to be easterly and southeasterly, with gusts of 15"20 m/s in the western part of the region during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But what really stood out to me was the East Kazakhstan Region getting rain and snow at night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But what really stood out to me was the East Kazakhstan Region getting rain and snow at night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the East Kazakhstan Region, rain and snow are expected at night in the north.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, and then thunderstorms and hail during the day. Plus, those wind gusts up to 25 m/s.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, and then thunderstorms and hail during the day. Plus, those wind gusts up to twenty five meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thunderstorms and hail are expected in the north and east during the day. The wind will be southeast and south, strengthening at night in the north, and during the day in the west, north, and east up to 15"20 m/s with gusts up to 25 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's just a lot of everything. And then down in Mangystau, they had dust storms forecasted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's just a lot of everything. And then down in Mangystau, they had dust storms forecasted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the Mangystau Region, a dust storm is expected in the west and center during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, with southeasterly winds strengthening up to 23 m/s occasionally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, with southeasterly winds strengthening up to twenty three meters per second occasionally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The southeasterly wind will strengthen in these areas up to 15"20 m/s, occasionally reaching 23 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild how different each region's risks wereâ€”like Pavlodar with thunderstorms, North Kazakhstan with rain at night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild how different each region's risks were-like Pavlodar with thunderstorms, North Kazakhstan with rain at night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the Pavlodar Region, thunderstorms are expected in the south and east during the day. In the North Kazakhstan Region, rain is expected at night, and a thunderstorm is forecasted in the southwest during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And even the Turkestan Region's mountainous areas weren't spared, with thunderstorms and strong northeasterly winds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And even the Turkestan Region's mountainous areas weren't spared, with thunderstorms and strong northeasterly winds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the mountainous areas of the Turkestan Region, thunderstorms are expected during the day. The northeasterly wind in these areas will reach 15"20 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like it was a system affecting almost the entire country, really.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like it was a system affecting almost the entire country, really.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely a day to stay indoors if you could.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely a day to stay indoors if you could.
